org.giiwa.conf

类 Local

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.dao.Bean
      • org.giiwa.conf.Local
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>

    public final class Local
extends Bean
    The Class Global is extended of Config, it can be "overrided" by module or configured, it stored in database

    yjiang
